sections.instructor: Wilson, James, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: This section is part of the Community of Pride learning community, a community designed for queer and trans students and allies. To join, email charrington@dvc.edu.  Note: Partially online course with required meetings Wednesdays, 12:45-2:10 PM (on-campus, see room on schedule) with all other instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.
